messages.message: Some usability feedback here. I feel it's quite common to ask questions like "can you do this..." (I do it all the time in chatgpt). The responses in Converse are just 'yes' as opposed to the actual task being done. Maybe we could have a tooltip to educate users how to best ask these questions, especially since users would be charged per query?
Yes, we have observed this with users. We are working to address this with a tips / FAQ section in addition to the guidance present in welcome doc in sample project
